fields.label: Event Days
fields.name: event_days
fields.instructions: Add in all the days that your event is taking place on. This will help populate performances, schedules and stage breakdowns on the website.

sub_fields.label: Display Text
sub_fields.name: display_text
sub_fields.instructions: How would you like this text to be displayed on site? For example "FRIDAY" or "24th August"

sub_fields.label: Artists
sub_fields.name: artists
sub_fields.instructions: Select which artists are involved in this performance. Most of the time this is just one artists, but you can add up to three.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions: How do you want this performance to show up on the site?

choices.artistList: Just display the artist or artists selected
choices.custom: Add in my own bespoke title for this performance

fields.label: Stage
fields.name: stage
fields.instructions: Which stage is this performance taking place on? You can set your stages up in "Stages" on the left.

fields.label: Performance Day
fields.name: performance_day
fields.instructions: Which day does this performance take place on? You can set your festival days over in your Event Settings area.

title: Tracking Scripts

fields.label: Google Tag Manager ID
fields.name: gtm_id
fields.instructions:
Paste in your Google Tag Manager Account ID here.

Log in to your Google Tag Manager account and open a container. In the top right corner (next to the Submit and Preview buttons) you‚Äôll see some short text that starts with GTM- and then contains some letters/numbers. That‚Äôs your Google Tag Manager ID. Paste it in, for example "GTM-b24324"

fields.label: Other snippets
fields.name: other_snippets
fields.instructions: Sometimes you have other tracking codes you need to put in. These will all be added to the bottom of your site, just before the body tag. Be careful here friend. üßëüèª‚Äç‚úàÔ∏è

description: Tag Manager, and ability to put in custom JS in the footer

fields.label: Schedule File
fields.name: schedule_file
fields.instructions: If you'd like to include a downloadable version of the schedule, normally in a PDF file, you can attach it here. It'll appear fixed on the schedule page. ü§ì

fields.label: Featured Image
fields.name: featured_image
fields.instructions: This will be used on the news listing page, and any feature articles area.

title: Banner

fields.label: Banner Type
fields.name: banner_type
fields.instructions: Your banner can be just a title, or it can have a video or image in the background. Pick one üëì

choices.fullWidth: As wide as the screen allows
choices.maxWidth: As wide as your site's maximum width

fields.label: Banner Image
fields.name: banner_image
fields.instructions: This image should be around 2500 pixels wide to make sure it looks great on big desktop screens. It will automatically compress and resize to be perfect for web.

fields.label: Small Screen Banner Image
fields.name: small_screen_banner_image
fields.instructions: An optional image for smaller screens like phones. Good if you want an alternate crop on smaller screens. Can be 1200px wide. If left blank we'll just deliver the larger image, scaled down in size.

fields.label: Small Screen Banner Video
fields.name: small_screen_banner_video
fields.instructions: An optional video to render for small screens. Can be 640px wide, smaller the better in file size to keep things great and fast to load. Otherwise it'll load the main video.

fields.label: Brightness
fields.name: brightness
fields.instructions: You can slide the brightness down if your image or video is too bright.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: banner_title
fields.instructions: What's the title you'd like to include here?

fields.label: Banner subheading
fields.name: plotcms_banner_subheading
fields.instructions: Optional subheading to appear below the main heading

fields.label: Link
fields.name: banner_link
fields.instructions: Do you want this banner to link somewhere? You can by pasting a url in here. If you don't want it to be a link, you can just leave this blank.

fields.label: Open link in new tab?
fields.name: banner_link_open_in_new_tab
fields.instructions: If you'd like the banner link to open up in a new tab or window, check this box.

fields.label: Show button?
fields.name: show_button
fields.instructions: If you'd like to include a button on this banner, check this.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: button_text
fields.instructions: What text do you want to say on the button?

description: Options for text only, image or video banners.

title: Sub Navigation

fields.label: Show the Lineup Submenu?
fields.name: show_the_lineup_submenu
fields.instructions: Check this to include a submenu for all lineup related pages below the banner. Control of this menu can be found in the Menus section in this admin area.

description: Ability to add in subnav links on pages that aren't the homepage.

fields.label: Banner Image
fields.name: banner_image
fields.instructions: Pick a banner image to display at the top of the biog. This image should be around 2500 pixels wide to make sure it looks great on big desktop screens. It will automatically compress and resize to be perfect for web.

fields.label: Small Screen Banner Image
fields.name: small_screen_banner_image
fields.instructions: An optional image for smaller screens like phones. Good if you want an alternate crop on smaller screens. Can be 1200px wide. If left blank we'll just deliver the larger image, scaled down in size.

fields.label: Featured Image
fields.name: featured_image
fields.instructions: For use in artist listing pages on the website.

fields.label: Biog
fields.name: biog
fields.instructions: Information about this artist that will display on their artist page.

fields.label: Performances
fields.name: performances
fields.instructions: These display on the biog and also help build your Schedule Builder. Most artists will only have the one performance, but if they do need multiple performances you can add in as many as you want here.

fields.label: Hide Ticket Buttons
fields.name: hide_ticket_buttons
fields.instructions: Selecting this will hide the whole ticket button area. This is useful if you're not on sale yet, or if you want to display some Plot Layouts with information instead.

fields.label: Tickets Announcement
fields.name: tickets_announcement
fields.instructions: An optional announcement to sit above the tickets. Allows you to give a specific piece of advice or sales message to visitors.

choices.grid: Display ticket options in boxes within a grid

sub_fields.label: Group Name
sub_fields.name: group_name
sub_fields.instructions: You can group your tickets together. A typical group name would be "Weekend" or "Friday Tickets"

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: An optional image for this ticket option. At least 1200px wide please. Images are only used in the grid layout, and they're used as background images, so use something that can have text over the top nicely. üíÄ

sub_fields.label: Subheading
sub_fields.name: subheading
sub_fields.instructions: Optional text to go underneath the title.

sub_fields.label: Price
sub_fields.name: price
sub_fields.instructions: The display price of this ticket.

sub_fields.label: url
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: Paste in the link for this ticket from your ticketing provider.

sub_fields.label: Button text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text for the link button

sub_fields.label: Sold out
sub_fields.name: sold_out
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to disable this ticket box with a sold out message, check this.

title: Plot Page Designer

fields.label: Plot Layouts
fields.name: plot_layouts
fields.instructions: Add in as many custom Plot Layouts as you wish. You can drag and drop your segments to have complete control of your pages. üëç

choices.fullWidth: As wide as the screen allows
choices.maxWidth: As wide as your site's maximum width

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: plotcms_color_scheme
sub_fields.instructions: This is the background colour beyond and around your full width image or video. Remember! Your colour palettes can be set in the site Customizer. üêï

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Please add a title for this Plot segment. The title appears over the image or video. You can leave blank if you'd like, if you don't want any text.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph
sub_fields.name: paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: You can have a paragraph of text to appear below your title. It's optional, do what you want!

sub_fields.label: Background Type
sub_fields.name: background_type
sub_fields.instructions: Please pick if this background should be an image, or a video.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Please pick an image to appear in the background. Images should be around 2,500 pixels wide or larger. The system will resize and compress these images for you to optimise for web.

sub_fields.label: Small Screen Background Image
sub_fields.name: small_screen_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: A smaller image size for phone screens. 1200px x 1200px ish will be fine! If you leave blank, we can resize automatically the other image without a problem. This is good for if you want a different crop, or even a completely different image for phones.

sub_fields.label: Background video
sub_fields.name: background_video
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an mp4 to use as a background video. Make sure it doesn't have audio! And also keep the filesize down by compressing for web. Smaller the better please üôè

sub_fields.label: Small Screen Background Video
sub_fields.name: small_screen_background_video
sub_fields.instructions: An optional video to render for small screens. Can be 640px wide, smaller the better in file size to keep things great and fast to load. Otherwise it'll load the main video.

sub_fields.label: Brightness
sub_fields.name: brightness
sub_fields.instructions: You might want to change the brightness of the background so that the text can be read over the top. 0 is completely transparent, and 100 is completely visible. Slide away üçî

sub_fields.label: Link Type
sub_fields.name: link_type
sub_fields.instructions: You can give this section a link if you'd like. Pick which type you'd prefer.

choices.button: Users can click the button on screen to link through to a URL of your choice
choices.segment: Users can click anywhere on this whole section to link through to a URL of your choice

sub_fields.label: Add Button?
sub_fields.name: add_button
sub_fields.instructions: You can show a visible button on this too if you'd like. It'll link to the same URL as clicking anywhere on the segment, but can help people better understand there's a link to follow.

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Words to appear on your lovely button.

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: Where do you want this link to head to when clicked? Paste in a URL of your choice.

sub_fields.label: Open in a new tab?
sub_fields.name: open_in_new_tab
sub_fields.instructions: Check this if you want the link to open in a new tab.

sub_fields.label: Colour Scheme
sub_fields.name: plotcms_color_scheme
sub_fields.instructions: Remember! Your colour palettes can be set in the site Customizer.

sub_fields.label: Position
sub_fields.name: plotcms_position
sub_fields.instructions: The position of our fluid content segment on wider screens.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: You can leave this blank if you don't want a heading.

sub_fields.label: Colour Scheme
sub_fields.name: plotcms_color_scheme
sub_fields.instructions: Remember! Your colour palettes can be set in the site Customizer.

sub_fields.label: Layout option
sub_fields.name: layout_option
sub_fields.instructions: On desktop, you can have an image on the left of your text, or to the right. On phone screens, images will appear above your content.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: If you don't want a heading for this segment, you can leave blank.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Please pick an image you'd like to use. Images should be around 1200 pixels wide or larger. The system will resize and compress these images for you to optimise for web.

sub_fields.label: Add link button?
sub_fields.name: add_link_button
sub_fields.instructions: Check this if you'd like to include a button link at the end of the content area.

sub_fields.label: Button text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: What words do you want to display on this button?

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: Where do you want the button to link to? üë®üèª‚ÄçüöÄ

sub_fields.name: open_in_a_new_tab
sub_fields.instructions: Check this if you want the link to open in a new tab.

sub_fields.name: plotcms_color_scheme
sub_fields.instructions: Remember! Your colour palettes can be set in the site Customizer.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: An optional heading for this segment

sub_fields.name: block
sub_fields.instructions: Add as many link blocks as you'd like.

sub_fields.instructions: Paste in a URL where you would like this Block Link to go to.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image

sub_fields.name: brightness

sub_fields.instructions: If you haven't added any FAQs yet, or need to add more, head to FAQs in the main menu.

sub_fields.label: Brightness

title: Notifications

fields.label: Disabled
fields.name: disabled
fields.instructions: Disable me if you want to turn me off! üôå

fields.label: Notification Type
fields.name: notification_type
fields.instructions: Banners appear at the top of pages. Popups appear as a modal in front of everything. Popups can have images and buttons, banners are for shorter messages.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: image
fields.instructions: A featured image for the popup. Make sure it's at least 1500px wide.

fields.label: Message
fields.name: message
fields.instructions: What message would you like this notification to say?

fields.label: Show Button?
fields.name: show_button
fields.instructions: If you would like a link button on this popup, please tick.

fields.label: URL
fields.name: url
fields.instructions: Where do you want this button to link to?

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: button_text
fields.instructions: What message do you want to write on the button?

fields.label: Show notification within a specific time frame?
fields.name: show_notification_within_a_specific_time_frame
fields.instructions: Check if you want to pick a date and time range for this notification.

fields.label: Date from
fields.name: date_from
fields.instructions: When should this notification appear?

fields.label: Date to
fields.name: date_to
fields.instructions: When should this notification expire?

fields.label: Time until popup shows
fields.name: time_until_popup_shows
fields.instructions: Time in seconds until the popup arrives on screen for your visitors.

choices.exclude: Show on all pages, apart from certain pages that I pick
choices.include: Let me pick specifically which pages it should show on

fields.label: Which pages?
fields.name: which_pages
fields.instructions: Which pages do you want this notification to show on?

fields.label: Exclude these pages
fields.name: exclude_these_pages
fields.instructions: If you'd like to pick a page to not show the notification on, you can. üßëüèª‚Äç‚úàÔ∏è

description: Options for notification popups and banners

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logo
fields.instructions: Please upload a png with a transparent background for these if possible, so they blend with the site better. At least 300px wide.

fields.label: Link
fields.name: link
fields.instructions: Paste in a URL if you want this logo to be clickable. If you leave it blank, it won't be clickable.

fields.label: Answer
fields.name: answer
fields.instructions: Please add the answer to this frequently asked question below:

fields.label: Footer Logo
fields.name: footer_logo
fields.instructions: This will default to use the main logo for your event. But sometimes that doesn't look so nice in the footer, so you can override, with maybe a white out or monochrome version. If you leave blank, it'll use the main one.

fields.label: Include a message in the footer?
fields.name: include_a_message_in_the_footer

fields.label: Footer Message
fields.name: footer_message
fields.instructions: A custom optional message to appear in the footer on all pages.

fields.label: Include newsletter signup
fields.name: footer_include_newsletter_signup
fields.instructions: Would you like a newsletter sign up form to appear in the footer on all pages?

fields.label: Newsletter Text
fields.name: footer_newsletter_text
fields.instructions: Useful text to explain the newsletter sign up form in the footer

fields.label: Newsletter form
fields.name: footer_newsletter_form
fields.instructions: Which form is your newsletter signup form?

fields.label: Include Footer Navigation?
fields.name: include_footer_navigation
fields.instructions: Your footer navigation items can be set within the "menus" section of the admin. üß≠

title: Tickets Button

fields.label: Show main tickets button
fields.name: show_main_tickets_button
fields.instructions: The main tickets button appears fixed to the bottom on all pages on phones, and in the header on all pages on desktop. Check this if you want to include this.

fields.label: Main Tickets Button Text
fields.name: main_tickets_button_text
fields.instructions: The wording for your ticket button. For example, "BUY NOW - from ¬£39.99"

fields.label: Main Tickets Button Link
fields.name: main_tickets_button_link
fields.instructions: A link to where you would like this main button to head. This can either be straight to your ticket provider, or over to your own tickets page. üö§

fields.label: Exclude Main Tickets Button
fields.name: exclude_main_tickets_button
fields.instructions: Want to hide the Main Tickets Button on certain pages? Slap them in here.

description: Options for the big ticket button that typically appears sitewide

title: Social Media

fields.label: Facebook Link
fields.name: facebook_link
fields.instructions: Paste in your Facebook Page URL.

fields.label: Instagram Link
fields.name: instagram_link
fields.instructions: Paste in your Instagram Page URL.

fields.label: Twitter Link
fields.name: twitter_link
fields.instructions: Paste in your Twitter Page URL. All these are optional of course!

description: Social Media links that are typically sitewide, aka in the footer
